newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israeli soldiers kill Palestinian in West Bank.
newsitem.headline: Israeli soldiers kill Palestinian in West Bank.

text.p: Israeli soldiers shot dead a Palestinian during a clash in the West Bank on Tuesday, Palestinian Health Ministry officials said.
Witnesses said the man was shot in the head near the Palestinian town of Nablus. Health Ministry officials said he was pronounced dead at a local hospital.

Earlier in the day, Israeli soldiers shot dead a Palestinian teenager in the West Bank town of Hebron. Israeli police said he had tried to run down an Israeli officer at a roadblock but Palestinian witnesses denied this.

Palestinians identified the man shot in Nablus as Haitham Mansour, a university student in his early 20s, and said he was from the nearby village of Kufr Qallil. An Israeli army spokesman said he was checking the report.

Witnesses to the killing said Israeli troops had opened fire at stone-throwing Palestinians near a checkpoint on the outskirts of Nablus. Several other Arabs were treated for rubber bullet wounds and teargas inhalation, the health officials said.

Street battles erupted in the West Bank 13 days ago after Israel broke ground for a Jewish settlement in Arab East Jerusalem. On Saturday, Israeli soldiers shot dead a Palestinian near the town of Ramallah, the first fatality in the current wave of violence.
